name: jellyfin-console
description: This is an open-source user interface made specifically for managing jellyfin and related services from a single, unified web management console.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:run
